Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: I love everything about The Grounds for Sculpture! The Van Gogh Cafe had amazing ambience, reasonable prices and Janice was beyond friendly and helpful! We can't wait to go back!!

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Located in the museum, love the drip coffee there.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Van Gogh Cafe is located in the welcome center of Ground For Sculpture. The roof was the painting of Van Gogh - ‚ÄúThe Starry Night ‚Äú in digital format. ‚Ä¶

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Staff are always friendly and helpful. You get your orders quickly and meals are always tasty. They are fairly priced. There's so much art to check out while you're there. Outdoor dining here is always a great time with stunning views. It's a great place to take a quick lunch break and relax.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Picked up A tote "picnic in the Park" at this quaint Cafe while touring the Grounds for Sculpture in Hamilton NJ.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: We were able to get pastries that were very tasty. Also my nephew got a PB and jelly sandwich that hit the spot. The service was quick and professional. She was a nice lady that explained everything regarding the options. will definitely go back when visiting grounds for sculpture!

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Very expensive for highly lackluster food and drinks items. There is a lovely view of the cute pond and beautiful scenery.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Stepping into the painting and art to a French bistro. Excellent!

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Cute little cafe. Nice small selection of items to get if you‚Äôre needing a snack or drink. Very clean, the staff was very nice.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Nicevwine, and lovely appetizers, but not a real lunch option like before covid.  Peacock came right up to us, and great location on pond with coy and sculptures.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: The food was excellent and the atmosphere was pleasant. Very rustic feel. There was no bar waiting area but that is likely temporary due to covid.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: located in an art museum, near a sculpture based on Van Gogh, this Cafe is decorated as a French village under a ceiling painted as "Starry Night." ‚Ä¶

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Coffee is so so view is gorgeous.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Not what i expected from a cafe. Hot drinks barely luke warm and limited snack offerings. Wait til you leave the Grounds for Sculpture and just find a Starbucks or Dunkin Donuts.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Great place to relax after touring the gardens, especially on a cold afternoon!

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Starry Night is re-created in the ceiling and you can grab a bite and offerings from the coffee bar. A nice place to stop for a break walking around the Grounds for Sculpture.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: This place is so extraordinary attractive by own location and lazy atmosphere. But it was too late and we were hurry up.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: This cafe is at the grounds of sculptures.  Again amazing place to just set and watch the lake come to life.

Name: Van Gogh Cafe
Review Text: Nice little cafe in the Grouns For Sculpture outdoor museum.

Review Text: Covid is messing this place up. In the past I have had really nice experience here. It will come back I am sure.
